currentDoc: Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

When I first heard the bee talk, I wasn't sure who or what the sound was coming from.  I looked around, but I didn't see anyone so I kept walking through the park.  "Your majesty.  Down here.  On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't considered with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

When I first heard the bee talk, I wasn't sure who or what the sound was coming from.  I looked around, but I didn't see anyone so I kept walking through the park.  "Your majesty.  Down here.  On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now? On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 20 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    N

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

When I first heard the bee talk, I wasn't sure who or what the sound was coming from.  I looked around, but I didn't see anyone so I kept walking through the park.  "Your majesty.  Down here.  On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 20 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled.", the bee said.

When I first heard the bee talk, I wasn't sure who or what the sound was coming from.  I looked around, but I didn't see anyone so I kept walking through the park.  "Your majesty.  Down here.  On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 20 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   He said that he and his descendents woul

On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 20 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 20 years."

On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 20 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 20 years."

On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 20 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 20 years."


"So, what do you want me to do?", I said.
  "Well, do you need us?

"Well, every 20 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 20 years."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

When I first heard the bee talk, I wasn't sure who or what the sound was coming from.  I looked around, but I didn't see anyone so I kept walking through the park.  "Your majesty.  Down here.  On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 20 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 20 years."


"So, what do you want me to do?", I said.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

When I first heard the bee talk, I wasn't sure who or what the sound was coming from.  I looked around, but I didn't see anyone so I kept walking through the park.  "Your majesty.  Down here.  On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 20 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 20 years."


"So, what do you want me to do?", I said.

When I first heard the bee talk, I wasn't sure who or what the sound was coming from.  I looked around, but I didn't see anyone so I kept walking through the park.  "Your majesty.  Down here.  On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 20 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 20 years."


"So, what do you want me to do?", I said.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

When I first heard the bee talk, I wasn't sure who or what the sound was coming from.  I looked around, but I didn't see anyone so I kept walking through the park.  "Your majesty.  Down here.  On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 20 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 20 years."

"So, what do you want me to do?", I said.

"Well, every 50 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 50 years."

"So, what do you want me to do?", I said.

"Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 50 years."

"So, what do you want me to do?", I said.
  "Well, do you need us?", the bee said.  "I can't see why I would need you.  You wouldn't be a help in the problems that I have right now", I said.  "I see.  Well, we will be there when

"Well, every 50 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 50 years."

"So, what do you want me to do?", I said.
  "Well, do you need us?", the bee said.  "I can't see why I would need you.  You wouldn't be a help in the problems that I have right now", I said.  "I see.  Well, we will be there when you

On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 50 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 50 years."

"So, what do you want me to do?", I said.
  "Well, do you need us?", the bee said.  "I can't see why I would need you.  You wouldn't be a help in the problems that I have right now", I said.  "I see.  Well, we will be there when you are needed.  We will retu

"Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 50 years."

"So, what do you want me to do?", I said.
  "Well, do you need us?", the bee said.  "I can't see why I would need you.  You wouldn't be a help in the problems that I have right now", I said.  "I see.  Well, we will be there when you are needed.  We will return in 50 years.  Bzzzbye to you!", the bee

On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 50 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 50 years."

"So, what do you want me to do?", I said.
  "Well, do you need us?", the bee said.  "I can't see why I would need you.  You wouldn't be a help in the problems that I have right now", I said.  "I see.  Well, we will be there when you are needed.  We will return in 50 years.  Bzzzbye to you!", the bee said. 

"Yeah,

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

When I first heard the bee talk, I wasn't sure who or what the sound was coming from.  I looked around, but I didn't see anyone so I kept walking through the park.  "Your majesty.  Down here.  On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 50 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.    "Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future.  That is why we find his descendants every 50 years."

"Noram cast a spell that helped the bees survive while the world around us crumbled", the bee said.   "He said that he and his descendants would need us in the future. Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

When I first heard the bee talk, I wasn't sure who or what the sound was coming from.  I looked around, but I didn't see anyone so I kept walking through the park.  "Your majesty.  Down here.  On your shoulder", the bee said.  I looked down to see a bee in, what looked to be, a tiny red coat with golden buttons on it.  "Did I just take a journey to Narnia right now?  Is Aslan going to pop out somewhere?", I said.  

"No, your majesty.  Aslan isn't concerned with earth right now.  He has other matters to attend to.  The bees need your help", the bee said.      "What do you mean, the bees need my help?", I said.  "Well, every 50 years, the honey bees will seek out the descendent of King Noram.  Noram was a human who helped out bees to a great extent generations ago.
